enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Theatre Majors
Add Consent: Instructor Consent Required
title: SoC THEATRE 330-0-21 Topics in Theatre

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Stage Combat.
This course will provide the student an understanding of basic stage combat while exploring physical risk and maintaining safety measures, all while telling a story through body, voice and movement.? Each student will be required to purchase a sword for $70.00. The student will also be required to maintain this sword. If it is lost, a replacement sword will not be available. The student owns and will be able to have the sword once the semester is over.

*Please email Matt Hawkins and explain why you want to take this class. Because of the limited number of spots, your reasons on why you want to take this class will be taken into consideration when permission numbers are handed out.
matt.hawkins@northwestern.edu

subject: THEATRE
